title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.97 - Aluminum or magnesium dross
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.97 - Aluminum or magnesium dross

State Regulations

Aluminum dross or magnesium dross is prohibited when
shipped hot or when containing moisture liable to cause heating or fire during
transportation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1211.97

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
